SensorErrorEvent.summary: The SensorErrorEvent interface of the Sensor APIs provides information about errors thrown by a or derived interface.

SensorErrorEventError.summary:
The error read-only property of
the interface returns the
object passed in the event's constructor.

SensorErrorEventSensorErrorEvent.summary:
The SensorErrorEvent() constructor
creates a new object which provides information about
errors thrown by any of the interfaces based on .
